class_notes: (Same as IBS 720 1) This course covers modeling physiologically-based pharmacokinetic and toxicokinetic modeling, and will be relevant to students in the EHS graduate program, the GDBBS Molecular and Systems Pharmacology program, and possibly relevant to biomedical engineering students. This class is cross-listed with IBS 720
course_description: The fundamental concepts underlying PBTK/PBPK modeling.
sections: Class Nbr: 5679, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 5:30-7:20p, Instructor: Q. Zhang, Status: Open
